Author: GeoffreyIsWet
Text: Yes, I feel the same too! Like I said, mine is more of a way to cope than it is any societal pressures to lose weight etc, I couldn't really care for comparing my body to other people's if that makes sense. So I don't feel I need therapy as much for the ED, rather therapy moreso to find healthier coping mechanisms.   Feel free to message me if you need it!

Author: virgotaurus
Text: As someone who also deals with serious trauma (my current relapse is being triggered by my sexual assault), I can relate. *hugs*   Idk about you but I kind of hope that working through the trauma will help me make sense of my ED since my issues are so closely connected. Anyway. I hope you get better.
